testcase.name: Validate simple navigation to the provided url
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and launch the url provided...........................passed When user log-in his credentials, username and password.....................passed And user click submit a new application.....................................passed And user fill-out the forms.................................................passed And user click the next button..............................................passed And user verify if all the inputted values displayed in the summary screen..passed And user click validate and send button.....................................passed Then user is redirected to thank you page...................................passed
